entry.title: google in china 2014
entry.content:
These days, google is blocked by firewall in China.

You can not use gmail, access goagent, although this a new leader, but the range of block is more and more varient.

And now google is blocked.

Resolve Google’s Block in China

ping the ip

super ping

use goagent

goagent

it is hosted on github, if you can not get it, try find host to github.

The relevent articles in Chinese

Chrome’s quic: http://www.williamlong.info/archives/3879.html Find Google hosts: http://www.williamlong.info/archives/3878.html google https: http://www.williamlong.info/archives/3872.html

entry.title: 试用ChromiumOS
entry.content:
对于Chromium OS，是一直只闻其声，而为见其形。 今天，下了一个编译配置好的hexxeh ChromiumOS。

总体感觉不错，云端的操作系统，提供常用谷歌服务。Linux内核，轻量系统速度飞快。

开机刚开始的配置界面，选择语言、键盘……（支持中文）。

谷歌帐号登录界面。

安装成功后。

原站点 Vbox虚拟机下载
